body_html:
Thank @pannous and @wchan very much.

I want to acheive the effect same with classify_image.py in path of tensorflow/tensorflow/models/image/imagenet. The file just use classify_image_graph_def.pb as model files, which seems to have contained trained variables. Do you have any idea about how to generate the .pb file with trained variables?

I want to acheive the effect same with classify_image.py in path of tensorflow/tensorflow/models/image/imagenet. The file just use classify_image_graph_def.pb as model files, which seems to have contained trained variables. Do you have any idea about how to generate the .pb file with trained variables?
